title: Help Kith'rak Voss
content:
come more powerful.

Help Kith'rak Voss Objectives

Meet Voss in Baldur's Gate.

Kith'rak Voss visited our camp and asked us to help him free someone held prisoner within the Astral Prism. We agreed to bring the Prism to Baldur's Gate and meet him there.

Help Kith'rak Voss Walkthrough

Help Kith'rak Voss takes place during Act 3. Talk to Lae'zel, she I'll say she wants to speak with Kith'rak Voss at Sharess' Caress. Voss can be found inside a room on the third floor of Sharess' Caress next to R
